A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After all the negative audience ratings\, I reluctantly went to see the film. I had such low expectations. But in the end\, I loved it. I loved the humour\, which reminded me of all the funny characters from Tatooine\, and the pacing and direction was awesome. Action sequences were top notch\, and I believe they did justice to Luke\, Leia and other classic Star Wars characters. Thank you Rian for a real Star Wars treat. Way better than the Force Awakens. Han Solo has nothing on Luke.
